channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Winter Boots
channel.desc: Give your winter wardrobe a new lease of life with our great selection of stylish boots. Find a great pair to complement any outfit throughout the season, from all of the brands you know and love.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Get Winter Ready with Kim & Co
channel.desc: Get your wardrobe winter ready with warm, cosy fashion from Kim & Co featuring chic knitwear, separates, dresses and more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sleepwear
channel.desc: Update your nightwear with our fabulous selection from some top brands. From comfy pyjamas and soft, stylish nightdresses to slouchy robes and more, we've got you covered.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: EMU Footwear
channel.desc: Showcase of Australian born, based and owned brand EMU that has passionately produced the world's finest premium sheepskin and Merino wool products for over 20 years.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Sleepwear
channel.desc: Update your nightwear with our fabulous selection from some top brands. From comfy pyjamas and soft, stylish nightdresses to slouchy robes and more, we've got you covered.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Luxury Jewellery
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Butler & Wilson Fashion Jewellery
channel.desc: Designed and made in London, this range of couture fashion jewellery by the renowned Simon Wilson includes larger-than-life crystal-set pieces.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Izabel London Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion from Izabel London. This inclusive brand caters to sizes 8 - 26 and features designs for the trend-conscious fashion fan shopping for everything from everyday style to holiday looks.

channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.desc: Join us for an hour of the latest fashion must-haves on QVC Style. With on-trend designs and wardrobe staples, you're sure to find something to elevate your look this season.

channel.title: Up to 50% off MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Transform your wardrobe with up to 50% off in the MarlaWynne Sale at QVC. Discover chic, versatile pieces at amazing prices and elevate your style for less.
